name: The Dark Dancer
strategy:
DonÂ´t take off your [[Dwarven Ring]] if you are using one from your last battle. It is very probable that you are still drunk, also its best to ignore the ghouls she summons.
Druid or Sorcerer: use [[Magic Shield]], and get a little closer to The Dark Dancer to corner her where you will know her position even if she goes invisible, shoot [[Explosion]] when invisible and [[SD]] when visible.
Knight: Stay diagonal right next to her in a corner, use [[Exori]] to make her visible and melee her.
Paladin: Use [[Explosion]] to make her visible and shoot, may be a good idea to shoot [[Ethereal Spear]] since most of your mana will be drained anyway.
